scripts.dev:full: concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm:dev --prefix server" "npm run dev"
scripts.seed:auth: node scripts/createAuthUsers.js serviceAccount.json || echo 'Provide path to service account when running manually'
scripts.seed:all: npm run seed:extended && npm run seed:companies && npm run seed:recruiter && npm run seed:institutions && npm run seed:audit
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:preview: vite build && firebase hosting:channel:deploy preview-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)
